name: Mavic Ksyrium UST Disc CL 700c Wheelset
description: These fast-rolling, tubeless-ready wheels are an excellent upgrade for bikes with disc brakes. The 28mm wide tubeless tires let you ride with lower tire pressure – without slowing you down. Lightweight aluminum hubs with cartridge bearings are smooth and easy to maintain. The 24 spokes are 2-cross laced to take care of brake torque and to create a stiff, dynamic wheel that stays straight and true, even when ridden hard.Maxtal aluminum rims.Internal rim width is 19mm and optimized for 28mm wide tires.Straight-pull flat double butted steel spokes.Spoke count is 24 (front and rear) and uses a 2 cross lacing pattern.Aluminum hubs with steel axles are compatible with Centerlock rotors.QRM cartridge bearings auto-adjust and for a smooth ride.Instand Drive 360 steel freehub body.28mm Yksion Pro UST tires are tubeless ready, fast-rolling and puncture resistant.Compatible with 12x142mm and 12x100mm thru-axle. Adapters for quick-release are included.Includes UST valves, tubeless rim tape, front and rear QR adapters, tire sealant and tire sealant syringe.Front wheel weighs 775g, rear 915g. Weighed without tires.
